meanings.definition: A breed of domestic chicken originating in China.
meanings.sent1: The farmer raised a beautiful cochin in his backyard.
meanings.sent2: The cochin clucked happily in the coop.
meanings.sent3: Why did the cochin sit on the remote control? To change the channel!
meanings.sent4: Her fluffy cochin was a feathered queen in the yard.
meanings.sent5: The cochin's colorful feathers made it stand out among the other chickens.

meanings.sent1: My friend visited Cochin during her trip to India.
meanings.sent2: Cochin is known for its beautiful backwaters.
meanings.sent3: Why did the tourist bring a ladder to Cochin? To see the city from a higher perspective!
meanings.sent4: In the bustling streets of Cochin, time seemed to stand still.
meanings.sent5: The aroma of spices filled the air in Cochin's markets.

meanings.definition: A type of high-quality, durable fabric.
meanings.sent1: She sewed a stunning dress using cochin fabric.
meanings.sent2: The cochin material was soft to the touch.
meanings.sent3: Why did the fashion designer choose cochin for the runway show? For its elegance and strength!
meanings.sent4: The cochin fabric shimmered under the stage lights.
meanings.sent5: The cochin fabric draped beautifully, enhancing the dress's design.
